paper_abstract: The study of spin-spin coupling constants across hydrogen bond provides useful information about configuration of complexes. The interesting case of such interactions was observed as a coupling across an intramolecular hydrogen bond in 8-bromo-2',3'-O- isopropylideneadenosine between the -CH2OH (at 5 '' proton) group and the nitrogen atom of adenine. In this paper we report theoretical investigations on the (4h)J(NH) coupling across the H ''-C-O-H center dot center dot center dot N hydrogen bond in adenosine derivatives in various solvent models.
paper_title: Theoretical study of spin-spin coupling across the hydrogen (O-H center dot center dot center dot N) bond in adenosine derivatives
